case.state: I've memorized all the rules of the game, of course!
Merlin's beard, you're Merula Snyde! My time-turner must've worked!
And Ron said I wouldn't have the nerve... this'll show him!

I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Um, give me 1. No, give me ~cards~!
I'll take ~cards~ cards this time.
...I'd better take ~cards~.
Brilliant!
I... think this will work. Yes!
Just what I needed!
Perfect.
My luck is beginning to change!
Thank Merlin!
This ought to do it! Thank goodness.
Phew! A good hand, at last.

Hey! Keep your eyes on your own cards, Harley!
This should do.
It could be worse.
This will do, I suppose.
I hope this is enough!
Perhaps this will work...
I wonder if the library has any strategy guides I could borrow...
For once I'm glad the others aren't interested in Muggle games. Standing here like this...
I hope this is enough. I couldn't bear to lose again...

Merlin's pants! These cards are horrible.

In for a knut, in for a galleon.

Well spotted - I am a girl.

It's not the first one I've seen, of course. But, er, I've never seen one without any hair.
You are entirely too blas about this, ~name~.
How disappointing. I can't actually see anything past all the hair.
You really can see everything.
How daring!
How daring!
...I bet if I told Ron about this he'd laugh...
Merlin's pants, you're adorable! I just want to eat you up! ...Metaphorically.
...I bet if I shaved mine, Ron would be all over me...
It's, um, a little wild. I suppose that's fitting.
It's so sexy, so confident... I'm burning up with jealousy!
So this is Muggle style? My books are out of date.
I was right! Wait until I tell Luna.
There's no reason to be embarrassed, ~name~. R-really.
It's not the first one I've seen, of course. But, er, the first one up close.
Oh! You really did it! I didn't think you would.
This whole evening has been remarkably educational.
It's just as perfect as the rest of you. How disappointing!
...I bet if I told Ron about this he'd be so jealous he'd be all over me...
So that's what other girls look like in person...
Oh, Merlin! I'm so close...!
I don't know where to look! Wait. Yes, yes, I do.
Oh! You mean you're actually--?
I'm not going to say I told you so, but I told you so.
What an idiot.
You should have known better than to challenge me, ~name~.
Oh! So we've come down to this?
Honestly, ~name~! Next time, pay more attention to your cards and less to my breasts!
It looks like I've won, ~name~.
I've been aching to see this...
You have no idea how ready I am for this.
That's... a little different than I imagined.
You can point that thing at someone else, mister. I have a boyfriend.
Are you really going to--right out in the open?
Time to pay your forfeit, mister.
I can't say I haven't been looking forward to this...
Boys. They're so easy.
I really must teach the seventh years about this game...
I've been waiting for this all evening!
Cum for me, ~name~. Make me forget all about those boys back at Hogwarts.
There's something fascinating about this...
There's something fascinating about the way your hand moves up and down, like I can't look away...
Is... is it normal if I feel damp down there?
We're breaking so many rules right now!
Stop staring at me while you do that!
I... don't mind if you use me for inspiration. If it would help.
What's good for the goose is good for the gander. Go ahead and use me for inspiration!
My imagination didn't even come close to the real thing.
You got some on my uniform! I'm going to have to wash this!
So that's cum? I didn't think it would be so... sticky.
Excuse me, I have to go vomit.
Oh... are you done already? You can keep going if you need to.
I'll remember this moment forever!
You-- you got some on me!
Full points for distance and volume, sir.
You couldn't have waited just a little longer? How typical!
There's so much... Would you-- would you mind if I tried some? For science?
Just lie back and think of... well, I don't know. Think of Harry!
Show of hands - who's willing to call it quits? ... Nobody? But-- oh.

state.text: I guess it's time, isn't it?

case.state: I'll bet Harry wishes he could see this.
One of us had to lose...
At last!
Just when I thought this couldn't possibly get more embarrassing, ~name~ joins in...
At least I won't be the only girl who has to humiliate herself tonight.
You're doing fine, your highness. Just lie back and think of, er, Agrabah.
That had better not be my Ron you're thinking of or I'm going to have to do something unforgivable to you both!
I've got several very good books on the subject if you want to learn more, Jasmine.
There must be something in the air! I'm experiencing the same problem.
Not that I think of him when I-- I mean, I don't even... Oh! Just get on with it.
How can you just do that like we're not all watching you?
Just-Just pretend I'm not here!
Of course, I'm not interested in girls myself, so...
I have to say I don't mind it being you, ~name~.
It looks like you're already wet...
Go ahead and start - don't mind me watching!
Go ahead... maybe I can learn a few things from you.
It's almost a crime for you to be doing that by yourself.
A year ago, I'd have thought you were a slut for this... but that was before Voldemort. Now I think you should enjoy yourself as much as you can!
I wonder how the physics of it works when you're incorporeal...
This isn't sexy; it's just sad.
You sound just like Moaning Myrtle! Just... like... her... Oh, my God.
I-I've never seen this before!
Whew! It's getting hot in here.
I--I am a bit interested in the mechanics of it, of course... for purely scientific reasons.
Wow, you're good at that. Um, do you mind if I take notes?
Your moans are... I think they're turning me on. What is happening to me?
The way you moan sounds like... Oh. My. God. THAT'S what Luna was doing? In class!?
This is humiliating! Excruciating, even! It's driving me wild!
Why do I feel so turned on? This can't be normal. Maybe I should get checked out.
Nerf? Like... the children's toys?
I didn't know ghosts could do that.
You'll always remember how you had to writhe around naked while I stood here fully dressed. And so will I.
You've lost your hold over me now, you know. I'll never be scared of you again.
Just what have I gotten myself into?
I don't know what to say. Well done?
That was very... educational, ~name~.
You're glowing... did it really feel that good?
Someday I hope I can feel that good.
Done already? I don't mind if you-- If you want to go another round.
No! Not yet! Not when I'm this close!
I... think I may be ready to go again. Huh.
I can't believe this! I memorized all the rules! This isn't fair!
I'll... I'll do it. A Gryffindor never goes back on her word.
I've never done this before, but I... I might know a spell for this...
I admit I've wanted to try out the spell, but not with people watching!
Oh! I didn't expect this.
Wait! That's my--! I didn't say you could put it in there!
That feels... um, sort of nice, actually.
Mmmmmmmm... I've been missing out on so much!
Oh... I think I'm nearly...
I'm... I'm cummmmmmming!
EXPECTO PATRONUM!
That was strangely liberating.
This game has given me so much to think about!
I... wouldn't mind playing again sometime.
I think I understand why the other prefects like this game so much.
I'm going to have to play with a handicap next time!
Maybe I should start losing on purpose. That looked like fun...
Ha! Wait until I tell Harry about this.
This went even better than I expected!
Exactly how I expected tonight to go.
Fifty points to Gryffindor!
Don't be ashamed being beaten by the brightest witch of her generation.
I'll have to see if Luna and Cho are up for a private game...
I'll have to invite Harry and Ron to play this with me!
I'd be happy to give you a spanking, Kim! You certainly deserve one.
You and I both know you cheated, ~name~! You'll be sorry when I figure out how...
I'd like to remind you that using Felix Felicis counts as cheating, ~name~.
Do you have any idea how statistically unlikely this game was?
The important thing is that we learned something from this.
Good game, ~name~. I almost had you that time!
M-maybe next time we could invite some boys?
At least this is better than being expelled... but only barely.
I've got one word for you, ~name~: Obliviate.

scene.directive: Oh, hello ~name~.
Did you know you're infested with wrackspurts?
That's probably why you're looking so glum. Wrackspurts are a terrible thing - worse than crumple-horned snorkacks!
L-LUNA!
It's not polite to shout, ~name~. I'm just checking the wrackspurt hive. And I've found your problem!
You really shouldn't wear underwear. It attracts them, you know.
See? I don't wear anything, and not a wrackspurt in sight! Not even a nargle!
Oh, no! I think the Wrackspurts have gotten to you, ~name~ - you're swelling up!
I'd better take care of this or else you'll never be rid of them!
Hm, hmm, hmm...
Mm, mm, mmm...
Hmm, mmm, mmm!
Oh, that?
It's a charm I learned from my mother. It keeps away Nargles.
Also, the vibration helps boys cum.
What? I'm not that thick.
Your cock, on the other hand, most definitely is.
Don't hold back, ~name~.
Mm! Mm! Mmph!
Yummy! Just like pudding.
Now, don't you feel better? I can see you smiling, ~name~.
But I think there are still some Wrackspurts left, so we'd better-- uh, oh.
Whoops!
Fun's over, ~name~. The polyjuice wore off.
So, how'd I do? Was I too over the top?
I had to stop from giggling a couple of times.
It was easy to set up. The hardest part was getting a Ravenclaw tie!
Getting the hair from Luna was easy. Actually, it was too easy.
I, um, I think she knew why I wanted it.
And... I think she's okay with it.
Now, I still haven't had my fun!
Maybe... Just maybe...
If you can make me cum...
I'll see just how okay Luna is with helping out.
You're here! Great!
Did you have any trouble finding the Room of Requirement?
You're probably wondering what I wanted to ask that I couldn't say in the Common Room.
Well... um, do you remember that spell I cast at our game?
You do, don't you? Don't make me say it out loud!
I've been doing some research into it. Lots of research, actually. There's a rather large number of books on the subject in the library.
Which shouldn't surprise anyone, I guess. Boarding school full of teenagers? I'm surprised there's not house orgies!
...Wait, there aren't house orgies, are there?
Anyway! I've found a particularly promising spell.
It's supposed to heighten pleasure by a factor of four. Four! Can you imagine?
You have no idea how badly I want to test it! But sadly, I'm missing something.
It's... not something I can buy. And I can't ask Snape for the ingredient either.
That's, um, well, that's where you come in.
You see... um... I'll just come out and say it, shall I?
I need cum. And it has to be fresh.
So... I was thinking... if you provide the ingredients, I'll do your homework for you. Does that seem fair?
Great! You won't regret this! I promise!
Let me just unzip you and-- well, I can see you won't have any trouble producing enough sperm.
Okay, so anytime you're ready, go ahead and cum. Okay?
What do you mean you can't? That's ridiculous.
All the books say boys your age cum at the drop of a hat.
Any hat!
And we've only got a few minutes before Professor McGonagal notices we're not in our dorms!
My shirt? B-but then I'd be out of uniform!
Besides, you've already seen--
Wait! Don't go. I'll-- I'll do it.
There! Now you can just cum and--
You want me to put my hands on your--? What kind of girl do you think I am?
Well... I guess it would be a learning experience.
And it's not like I'm completely innocent. I've read all about this.
You haven't cum yet...
Am I-- Am I doing something wrong?
Shh! Do you hear something?
That's McGonagal! She's arguing with Filch - they're just outside!
Come on ~name~, you've got to hurry!
You've got to... you... I've got to...
Mmph!
Mmph!
Mmm...
gulp
You could have told me! You bastard!
I... swallowed...
There's only one thing to do.
You're going to have to keep going until we get it right! Hee hee!
...That was ridiculous even for you, ~name~.
You're lucky I can even fit into my uniform after all these years!
And don't think I didn't notice how much bigger you got when I mentioned McGonagal catching us.
There is nothing sexy about that. Trust me.
And those lines you made me say... is that really what you thought of me in school?
I wasn't that prissy. And I dare say I knew more about sex than you did at that age, ~name~!
But I am a witch of my word, and it was your birthday present.
I hope you liked it.
Speaking of birthdays...
Mine is coming up soon, and I've decided what I want us to do.
You're going to be the suspected Death Eater in Azkaban, and I'm going to be the vengeful Auror who has to interrogate you... all night if need be.
Hey, Hermione. What's a girl like you doing in a place like this?
Remember me from the poker game? ~name~?
Wha... ~name~? What are you doing here? Slughorn's parties are invitation only, and--
Wait, did you say...?
Oh!
Well, well. I didn't know you had it in you!
If that's the way you want to play it, I'm game.
Come on, it's too loud in here. Slughorn has a guest room we can use to catch up.
This is much better, isn't it?
Oh, look, a bed. How convenient.
Why don't we rest for a while?
Whew! It feels good to get out of that dress for a minute.
Aren't you going to join me, ~name~?
Don't look at me like that! We're both girls, there's nothing wrong with being friendly.
After all, we see each other naked all the time anyway! Tee hee!
Oh... honestly! Fine.
The truth is... I can't get you out of my head.
That poker game... let's just say it awoke a side of me I never knew existed.
I want to see if you can make me feel that good again.
Oh, for the love of...
Just tell me what you want to hear!
I'm doing my best here. Give me something to work with!
Did I... Did I ruin it?
I want to fulfil your fantasies for you. All of them! I'm not judging! But I...
I just... screw everything up, don't I?
Did I come on too strong?
Don't you... want me anymore?
Oh!
Now this is more like it!
That's... that's good. When did you get so good at this?
I think I'm going to... I'm going to...
Oh, RON!
That was brilliant! The best so far.
You really know your way around a girl's body.
I'm so glad you abandoned that silly Chudley Cannons idea!
But I have to ask - whatever possessed you to choose ~name~, of all people?
Oi, 'Mione! Is that you in there? It's me, Ron.
R-ron?
Oh, right, sorry - I mean, 'what's a girl like you doing in a place like this?'
Come on, let's go home. Slughorn wouldn't give me any polyjuice, that bastard.
B-but... if you're out there, then who...?
Oh.
My.
God.
~Name~... please, oh, please...
I'll do anything if you follow my lead!
And I do mean anything.
I'll kiss your feet. I'll be your slave! I'm begging you!
Just save my marriage!
Hermione? ~name~? Wha-what's going on here?
Happy Anniversary, Ronald!
You know how you said you wanted a threesome? Surprise!
Look at who I've brought you as a present. Isn't she gorgeous?
I hope you don't mind me warming her up for you!
Now get over here and show us who's boss!
They've gone too far this time!
I can't believe they actually went through with it...
The Wizgamot, of course. Who else?
That stupid 'Marriage Purity Law' they've been talking about. It actually passed!
And it's worse than we thought.
Much, much worse.
Section 1.1: Any muggleborn witch who remains a virgin by her nineteenth birthday shall be placed in an unbreakable marriage contract with a pureblood wizard, or forfeit her magic for all time.
Section 1.2: Said contract to be fulfilled by the witch's twenty-first birthday or graduation from school, whichever comes first.
...Why couldn't we have just made a contract like this to stop Voldemort? Honestly, the Wizarding World is moronic sometimes.
...Most of the time.
Okay, pretty much always!
But that's not the worst part!
Section 2.1: Any man who takes the virginity of an unmarried witch under the age of 19 shall be sent to Azkaban.
Section 4.3: This law shall apply retroactively to all current Hogwarts students.
Care to guess exactly how many muggleborn girls at Hogwarts fall into this category?
That's right: one.
They're trying to silence me!
There's a reason no civilized country allows retroactive laws! This sort of crap was supposed to have died with Voldemort!
Before you say anything, yes, I know this is my fault.
Excuse me for wanting to actually finish my seventh year!
If only I'd given in to Ron's advances. Or even Viktor's!
I've already gotten that lecture from Mrs. Weasley, thank you very much.
Let me tell you, you have not experienced awkward until your boyfriend's mother tells you how disappointed she is that you're not a bigger slut.
They've already decided: I'm going to be contracted to Draco Malfoy. Ugh!
And conveniently I graduate in 48 hours.
Have I mentioned how much I hate them?
There is no way I'm going to marry that git!
But I'm not going to send Ron to Azkaban either.
What do you mean, what am I doing?
What does it look like I'm doing?
For someone who's supposed to be smart, you can be awfully slow on the uptake.
I've gone over the law five times now, looking for loopholes.
Do you know what the legal definition of 'virgin' is?
I looked it up: "Someone who is unsullied by sexual intercourse with another person."
I think you can see where I'm going with this...
Nowhere does it mention that a man has to do the, er, sullying.
What do you say, ~name~? Will you save me from a fate worse than death?
Deep down inside, you want to make me quiver and gasp your name again, don't you?
Or am I wrong? Did I mistake those looks you gave me at our poker game?
I mean, you don't have to. I have a backup plan if you turn me down...
But, um, it's Ron's sister Ginny. And that will just make the holidays super awkward.
Please? I can do a good job! I've studied it in books!
...Ron has a copy of 'Lusty Witch's Locker Room' he thinks I haven't found.
And I learn fast! I'm eager to learn.
Very eager.
You will? Oh, thank you! Thank you!
If you want me to keep this secret, I won't breathe a word. Witch's honour!
But, um, I'd really rather rub it in Draco's stupid face.
Now hurry up and strip! There's only 48 hours left.
That barely gives me enough time to thank you properly!
